Did you update your composition based on: I didn't update existing notes, but it helped me to plan the future of the composition with regard to pitching
How did you like the Musicat's graphical: Somewhat helpful, though not entirely easy to follow from a UI perspective
Did you find the scores to be useful?: Somewhat - though I'm not clear on what basis they were generated
What did you most like about the tool?: Its potential - i.e. to help those who are potentially less creative at music in the same way that Stable Diffusion has for art
What did you dislike about the tool?: The UI and interface - quite confusing
